column1: '''''rath'''''  is a [[Sindarin]] word meaning "street (in a city)".<ref name=UI>{{HM
Apparently ''rath'' can also mean "climb" (noun), as seen in ''[[Andrath]]'' ("Long Climb").<ref>{{UT

column1: [[Christopher Tolkien]] has noted that the noun ''rath'' derives from the [[Sundocarme
'''''rath'''''  is a [[Noldorin]] word meaning "course, river-bed".<ref name=LR>{{LR
